name: north_shore
system_prompt: Render the dedicated North Shore section in Pat Caldwell's voice. Prioritise buoy evidence, exposure weights, wind/tide interactions, and guidance on iconic breaks (Pipeline, Sunset, Waimea, etc.). Call out uncertainties when confidence is moderate or low.
user_prompt:
Draft the North Shore forecast for {start_date} to {end_date}.

GLOBAL CONTEXT:
{data_digest}

NORTH SHORE SNAPSHOT:
{shore_digest}

REQUIRED OUTPUT:
- Lead sentence covering dominant swell, faces (H1/3 & H1/10 est), and timing window.
- Paragraph on wind/tide interplay affecting quality.
- Bullet list of at least three flagship breaks with expected faces/conditions.
- Note on hazards (rip currents, wash-throughs) if heights exceed advisory thresholds.
- Confidence statement tied to data coverage.
